article:
'The Link' may refer to:

*The Link (retailer), a mobile phone retailer in the United Kingdom *The Link
(newspaper), a student newspaper at Concordia University in Canada *''The Link''
(album), by French death metal band Gojira *The Link (organisation), an Anglo-
German friendship organisation of the 1930s *The Link (organization), a community-
based nonprofit organization in Minneapolis, Minnesota *The Link REIT, a Hong
Kong real estate investment trust *The Link Homeschool Newspaper, published by
Mary Leppert *Darwinius â€“ 47-million-year-old fossil link between
prosimians and simians *The Link is the newsletter of the organization Americans
for Middle East Understanding *The Link, a division of NZ Bus that operates bus
services in Auckland's central city
